comment._content: Taken from the U-Bahn station "Landungsbrücken" platform, looking over Bei den St. Pauli-Landungsbrücken (streetname) towards river Elbe and the former Blohm & Voss shipyard.

comment._content: On the right one can see the Stülcken-Werft (shipyard)
